attributes.action: remove unsafe cattle grid, junction 38, m6 at old tebay
attributes.additional_details:
at junction 38 of the M6 motorway, there is a large cattle grid near the Old Tebay village. this is made of railway track. In the wet it is very slippery and as it is on a corner in both directions. represents a danger  to motorcyclists, due to both it's construction and the layout of the roads. this is because it is either on an exit of a roundabout or in the other direction joined by another road.

we petition the government to address this dangerous issue, by removal of the cattle grid, adding a grip surface, or road re alignment.
